pullRequest.body:
Formalize Hoeffding's lemma using the property of cumulant.

Co-authored-by: Yuma Mizuno [mizuno.y.aj@gmail.com](mailto:mizuno.y.aj@gmail.com)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [201d408ab3](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/18091/commits/201d408ab36238853b55072ddaa876ceea0a3312)

Import changes exceeding 2%

| %      | File |
| -      | -    |
| +5.58% | `Mathlib.Probability.Moments` |

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Probability.Moments | 1828 | 1930 | +102 (+5.58%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Probability.Moments`|102|
| `Mathlib.Probability.Hoeffding`|1931|

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ aemeasurable_expt`
`+ cum_deriv_one`
`+ cum_deriv_two`
`+ hoeffding`
`+ hoeffding_nonneg`
`+ integrable_bounded`
`+ integrable_deriv_expt`
`+ integrable_expt`
`+ integrable_expt_bound`
`+ integral_tilted`
`+ tilt_first_deriv`
`+ tilt_second_deriv`
`+ tilt_var_bound`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

> Thanks for the PR! It will require some changes because apparently you missed that we have definitions for the moment and cumulant generating functions. See [ProbabilityTheory.mgf](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Probability/Moments.html#ProbabilityTheory.mgf). You should use those definitions, and move their properties to the Moments file.

I got it. I'll move the lemmas about the first and derivatives of mgf and cgf to Probability/Moments file.

Thanks for the PR!
It will require some changes because apparently you missed that we have definitions for the moment and cumulant generating functions. See [ProbabilityTheory.mgf](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Probability/Moments.html#ProbabilityTheory.mgf).
You should use those definitions, and move their properties to the Moments file.
See https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/doc.html#citing-other-works for how to properly cite other works in Mathlib.

```suggestion
lemma integrable_expt_bound [IsFiniteMeasure ] {X :   } {t a b : } (hX : AEMeasurable X )
```

You already proved [MeasureTheory.memp_of_bounded](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/MeasureTheory/Function/LpSeminorm/Basic.html#MeasureTheory.mem%E2%84%92p_of_bounded) so you could use first [MeasureTheory.memp_one_iff_integrable](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/MeasureTheory/Function/L1Space.html#MeasureTheory.mem%E2%84%92p_one_iff_integrable) and then the Lp result.

pullRequest.title: feat: Hoeffding's lemma
